comments:
M4

When I double clicked on an extension type in the PDE add extension dialog I got the following exception. When the error dialog went away the dialog would not repaint.

STEPS
1) Open a plugin dependant on org.eclipse.ui.workbench
2) Select the extensions tab
3) Select preference transfers
4) Double click

Note that this does not happen consistently.

try this with M4 when it comes around (or latest builds), I haven't been able to reproduce this. reopen if it comes back.

are you running vista by any chance?

Yes - that is why I marked this as a Vista bug.

I haven't seen this for some time either and Vista is my primary platform.
